Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:26:36
Folder: CRHIB67 - reminder payment of outstanding dues for acc. 2038029628
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CRHIB67_00
From: noreply@dewa.gov.ae <noreply@dewa.gov.ae>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: 
BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-19 07:09
Subject: Reminder: Payment of outstanding dues for Acc. 2038029628
--------------------------------------------------


Dear Customer,

With reference to the above subject, we would like to draw your attention that there is an existence of outstanding payment of AED 1,142.07 Account no. 2038029628 has not been settled yet.
Please settle this payment within 3 days to ensure service continuity. Pay through www.dewa.ae/pay?ac=2038029628 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/9YdeCP5BDUAn1n5UzfQsxPc-P?domain=dewa.ae> .

For more information or inquiries, please contact our Customer Care Centre at customercare@dewa.gov.ae, or call 04-6019999.

Your happiness is our priority.
Dubai Electricity & Water Authority 






 <https://www.dewa.gov.ae/emailer/greenbill/images/dewa_footer_en.bmp> 	

________________________________


Disclaimer:
